title: Lady From Day
description: Finding a cure for an ill princess is harder that it seems.Traveling through the lands of Aelisonia, Lia and her band of adventurers hear a tale of an unusual illness that has caused the land of Feyris to go into famine and Queen Daylat to disappear in her attempts to find a cure.  On Liaâ€™s journey through the world of Orinda to complete the quest to save the princess, she runs into the dashing Prince of Feyris and the hands of the vicious and ill-tempered gorlag creatures.  Will Lia be able to find the cure for the princess before all hope is lost?
author: April Sadowski
